description: MsgAuthorize is the message type for the Authorize RPC.

address.description: Address is the address to authenticate.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

controller.description: Controller is the address of the controller to authenticate.

origin.description: Origin is the origin of the request in wildcard form.

token.description: token is the macron token to authenticate the operation.

title: Msg Authorize
